item.title: ‘Talamasca: The Secret Order’ Trailer Teases New Spy-Inspired Entry in Anne Rice’s Immortal Universe
item.description: The third series in AMC’s franchise, premiering Oct. 26, will feature Jason Schwartzman alongside Anne Rice’s ‘Interview with the Vampire’ stars Eric Bogosian and Justin Kirk.
